name: MarketPlace
description: A dynamic, user-friendly marketplace platform designed to connect MarketPlace with buyers.

name: Trello-Clone
description: Trello Clone is an end-to-end fullstack web app all with workspaces, boards, lists, cards, audit logs / activity as well as member roles.

name: Ride-Admin
description: This project is a Ride Hailing app for Ethiopia. Built using Nextjs, Firebase, and Firestore. The app allows Admin to monitor inprogress trips, track number of daily trips, available cars etc..

name: Food-Delivery
description: This project is a food delivery app built using React Native, Expo, Firebase, and Firestore. The app allows users to browse a variety of restaurants and menus, place orders, and track their deliveries in real-time.
